actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to remove the age limitation for receipt of a commission in the Public Health Service.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the Public Health Service Act prohibiting appointing to the Regular Corps of the Public Health Service or calling to active duty for over one year in the Reserve Corps an individual over 44 years old.

titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to remove the age limitation for receipt of a commission in the Public Health Service.
